titleStmt.title: An explicite declaration of the testimony of Christ according to the plain sayings of the Gospel: and therein, of the purposes, promises, and covenants of God, as by Gospel declared. With, a consideration of a question stated about faith. By Thomas Moore, Senior.
titleStmt.author: Moore, Thomas, Senior.

publicationStmt.publisher: by J.C. for Livewel Chapman at the Crown in Popes head alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
